description: Disbelievers worship false gods. The will burn forever in the Fire.
War is ordained by Allah and all Muslims must be willing to fight whether they like it or not.
Those who fail in their duty to Allah are proud and sinful. They will all go to hell.
Allah says that you must keep fighting until there is no more persecution and everyone on earth is a Muslim. Then you can stop killing people.
Kill disbelievers wherever you find them.
Don't bother warning the disbelievers. Allah has made it impossible for them to believe so that he can torture them forever after they die.
Allah increases disease.
If you compose a surah that is better than those in the Quran and then fail Allah will burn you forever in Hell.
Allah will shed human blood while angels praise him in heaven.
Kafirs go to hell.
There will come a day when Allah will refuse all prayers and help no one.
Allah brags about drowning the Egyptian army.
Christians and Jews will suffer in this life and go to hell in the next.
For disbelievers is a shameful doom.
For disbelievers is a painful doom.
Allah will make disbelievers' lives miserable in this world and torture them forever after they die.
Allah will leave the disbelievers alone for a while then resume the doom of Fire.
The doom of the disbelievers will not be lightened.
The kafirs will be sorry when they see the severe punishment of Allah!
They will not emerge from the Fire.
Those who hide the Scripture will have their bellies eaten with fire.
Murder for murder. Slave for slave. If you don't follow Allah's command you get the usual painful doom.
Fight 'cos Allah tells you to.
If there are bad guys left after you've killed off all the kafirs etc. then you'll have to kill them too.
It's you and your religion against them and theirs. They won't stop and if they succeed Allah will burn you forever in the Fire.
Those who disbelieve shall be overcome and  gathered unto Hell.
Non-muslims will be punished by Allah because they don't believe.
If they won't surrender is they're going to hell.
Promise the kafirs a painful doom. Give them the bad news.
Christians and Jews] think the Fire will only burn them for a certain number of days. They're wrong about that. The Fire will burn them forever.
Allah will neither speak to them nor look at them.
All non-Muslims will be rejected by Allah after they die.
Apostates will be cursed by Allah and his gang of angels.
No one will help the kafirs.
Disbelievers will have their faces blackened on the last day.
Those who disbelieve will be burnt in the Fire.
The Fire is prepared for disbelievers.
We shall cast terror into the hearts of those who disbelieve.
If you die fighting for Allah you'll be rewarded in heaven.
Kafirs will burn forever in the Fire.
Kafirs will have an awful doom.
Disbelievers do not harm Allah but will have a painful doom.
Disbelievers will have a shameful doom.
Taste ye the punishment of burning!
Those who brag about doing good will go to hell.
Those who die fighting for Allah will go to heaven.
Disbelievers will go to Hell.
Those who disobey Allah and his messenger will be burnt with fire and suffer a painful doom.
Apostates are going to hell.
Unbelievers will be tormented forever with fire. When their skin is burned off a fresh skin will be provided so torture can go on.
Allah will bestow a vast reward on those who fight in religious wars.
Kill your friends if they stop believing in Allah.
Allah give a clear warrant to hunt unbelievers.
Believers who kill believers will face the awful doom of hell.
After non-Muslims angels will ask them - Why didn't you move to an Islamic country? - But the angels won't wait for an answer. They'll just take them all to hell.
Allah will lead his opposers astray by arousing desires in them and they will go to hell.
Those who believe then disbelieve then believe and disbelieve again will never be forgiven by Allah.
The hypocrites will be in the lowest part of hell and no one will help them there.
You must believe everything Allah and his messengers tell you or you will face a painful doom.
For the wrongdoing Jews Allah has prepared a painful doom.
Allah will guide disbelievers down the road to hell. [See next verse for completeness].
Fear Me!
Those who deny Islam will be losers in the Hereafter.

Those who make war with Allah and his messenger will be killed or crucified or have their hands and feet on alternate sides cut off or will be expelled out of the land and in the next they will have an awful doom.
Disbelievers will have a painful doom.
Disbelievers will want to come out of the Fire but will not.
Cut off the hands of thieves. It is an exemplary punishment from Allah.
Allah makes some people sin. He will not cleanse their hearts. They will have ignominy in this world and in the Hereafter an awful doom.
Life for life eye for eye nose for nose ear for ear and tooth for tooth.
Christians will be burned in the Fire.
Christians are wrong about the Trinity. For that they will have an awful doom.
Muslims that make friends with disbelievers will face a doom prepared for them by Allah.
Disbelievers will be owners of hell-fire.
Allah will test believers to see if they are afraid. Those who fail a second test will suffer a painful doom.
Many generations have been destroyed by Allah.
Disbelievers will say when they see the Fire that they would have believed if they had known the truth. But they are all liars.
Those who disbelieve will be forced to drink boiling water and will face a painful doom.
When nonbelievers die the angels will deliver to them doom and degradation.
Allah allows some to disbelieve in the afterlife and to take pleasure in their disbelief so that he can torment them forever after they die.
Allah chooses to lead some astray and then shames them.
Allah will send everyone the Fire except those he chooses to deliver.
Let the idolaters kill their children. It is Allah's will.
The worst thing anyone can do is deny the revelations of Allah. Those who do so will be awarded an evil doom.
Allah the cowardly terrorist attacks when people are asleep.
Allah banishes Iblis and promises to fill hell with those who are mislead by him.
Disbelievers are the rightful owners of the Fire.
Entire nations have entered the Fire. Some get a double torment.
Taste the doom!.
Disbelievers will be excluded from heaven. Theirs will be a bed of hell.
Those in the fire will be taunted by those in the Garden: So how's it going down there? Are you enjoying the warmth of the Fire?
Those in the Garden will plead with Allah not to be cast into the Fire.
Those in the Fire will cry out to those in heaven saying: Pour water on us. But Allah has forbidden that to disbelievers.
Allah drowned everyone on earth (except Noah and his family) because they disbelieved.
Those who believe incorrectly will face the terror and wrath of Allah.
Allah cut the roots of nonbelievers.
Allah killed the disbelievers with an earthquake.
Shu'eyb tells the Allah's victims that they deserved to die for rejecting Islam.
Allah sent a famine on all of the Egyptians to punish Pharaoh.
Those who worship the calf will suffer terror and humiliation from Allah.
Allah has already sent many people and jinn to hell. They were worse than cows: they couldn't see or hear and were neglectful.
Allah will throw fear into the hearts of the disbelievers and smite their necks and fingers.
Disbelievers will be tormented in the Fire.
When you fight with disbelievers do not retreat. Those who do will go to hell.
Those that the Muslims killed were not really killed by them. It was Allah who did the killing.
Those that live or die in war are a clear proof of Allah's sovereignty.
Taste of the doom because ye disbelieve.
Those who disbelieve will be gathered into hell.
The wicked will He place piece upon piece and heap them all together and consign them unto hell.
The angels smite the face and backs of disbelievers saying: Taste the punishment of burning!
Don't let the disbelievers think they can escape. They are your enemy and the enemy of Allah.
Had it not been for an ordinance of Allah which had gone before an awful doom had come upon you.
Allah gave Muhammad slaves as war booty.
Slay the idolaters wherever you find them.
Don't let idolaters tend the sanctuaries. Their works are in vain and they will be burned in the Fire.
Helping the poor is not as important as believing in Islam and fighting in holy wars.
Give tidings (O Muhammad) of a painful doom to the rich and greedy Christian monks and Jewish rabbis.
Those who are tormented in the Fire will have their foreheads and backs branded.
If you refuse to fight Allah will afflict you with a painful doom.
Disbelievers go to hell.
Allah will afflict you with a doom from Him or at our hands.
Those who vex the Prophet for them there is a painful doom.
Those who oppose Allah and His messenger will burn in the fire of hell.
Fight the disbelievers and hypocrites. Be harsh with them. They are all going to hell anyway.
Those who refuse to give their wealth and lives to Allah will face the fire of hell.
Non-muslim who pretend to believe (so they won't be killed by Muslims) are unclean and will go to hell.
We shall chastise them twice then they will be relegate them to a painful doom.
Those that ignore Allah will be thrown into the fire of hell.
Believers must fight for Allah. They must kill and be killed and are bound thus by the Torah and Gospel and Quran. But Allah will reward them for it.
Don't pray for idolaters - they're all going to hell.
Fight disbelievers who are near you and let them see the harshness in you.
Disbelievers will have a boiling drink and a painful doom.
If you enjoy life and ignore Muhammad's bullshit Allah will torture you forever in hell.
Allah has destroyed entire generations.
On the last day Allah will kill all the disbelievers then he will torture them forever in hell.
His doom comes unto you as a raid by night.
The damned will feel remorse for what they have done but it will not save them from the doom that Allah has prepared.
Those who disbelieved will face a dreadful doom.
Allah drowned those who disbelieved his revelations.
Moses asked Allah to harden the hearts of the Egyptians so that they would not believe until they saw the painful doom.
If you deny the revelations of Allah you will be among the losers and will see the painful doom.
The doom cannot be averted from them and that which they derided will surround them.
Allah sent a lasting doom on those who mocked Noah.
Allah will send a painful doom on several nations.
Lo! there comes unto them a doom which cannot be repelled.
Allah killed everyone in Sodom and Gomorrah by dropping burning stones on them.
Lo! Is fear for you the doom of a besetting Day.
He will lead them to the Fire for watering-place.
The doom of the Hereafter
Those in the Fire will suffer as long as the heavens and earth endure.
Incline not toward those who do wrong lest the Fire touch you.
Allah will fill hell with humans and jinn.
Disbelievers are the rightful owners of the Fire
Those who do not answer Allah's call will go to hell.
Allah leads disbelievers astray while he torments them in this life. Then after they die he makes them suffer even more pain in the doom of the Hereafter.
The reward for disbelievers is the Fire.
When Allah dooms there is none that can postpone His doom.
Woe unto the disbelievers. Theirs will be an awful doom.
Those who are in hell will be forced to drink festering water which they can hardly swallow. They will want to die but they will not be able to. Theirs is a harsh doom.
There is no escape from Allah's doom.
Lo! for wrong-doers is a painful doom.
Allah leads wrong-doers astray and then sends them to hell.
They set up rivals to Allah that they may mislead men from His way. Say: Enjoy life while ye may for lo! your journey's end will be the Fire.
Warn mankind of a day when the doom will come upon them.
Those in hell will be chained together. Their clothing will be made of pitch and fire will cover their faces.
Iblis will lead humans astray. Only perfect Muslims will be safe from him. The rest will go to hell.
Allah's doom is a dolorous doom.
Allah made a roof fall in to kill unbelievers.
Disbelievers are evil and will dwell in hell forever.
Allah will cause the earth to swallow those who plan ill-deeds. The doom will come on them when they least expect it.
Theirs will be the Fire and they will be abandoned.
Theirs will be a painful doom.
The Hour of Doom is but a twinkling of the eye.
When those who did wrong behold the doom it will not be made light for them.
Allah will add doom to doom for those who disbelieve.
Those who oppose Islam will face an awful doom.
Disbelievers will have a painful doom.
Those who lose their faith in Islam will face an awful doom. Allah's wrath is upon them.
Those who invent lies against Allah will have a painful doom.
Allah made hell to be a dungeon for disbelievers.
Allah has prepared a painful doom for those who disbelieve in the Hereafter.
Allah destroyed entire towns.
How many generations Allah has destroyed since Noah!
Allah intends to burn people in hell.
Set not up with Allah any other god lest thou be cast into hell.
Lo! the doom of thy Lord is to be shunned.
Allah will destroy every town before the Day of Resurrection.
Whoever follows Iblis will be cast into hell.
Whoso is blind here will be blind in the Hereafter and yet further from the road.
Allah will send disbelievers astray. Then he'll burn them in hell increasing the flames from time to time.
Allah has prepared a Fire for the disbelievers. When they want a shower Allah will give them a shower of molten lead to burn their faces.
Christians will cry out to Allah's partners but they won't hear them; Allah will send them to their doom.
Those who are condemned to the Fire know they will have no way to escape.
Nothing prevents non-muslims from believing in Islam. So it's their own fault when they are sent to their doom.
There is an appointed time in which the doomed will find no escape.
Allah has destroyed many towns.
On a certain day Allah will present hell in plain view to the disbelievers.
Allah will welcome the disbelievers into hell.
The good works of disbelievers are all in vain. They will go to hell anyway.
Hell is the reward for disbelievers because they made a jest of Allah's revelations and messengers.
Jesus was not the Son of God. Christians are going to hell.
Allah will pluck out from every sect those who should burn in hell.
Allah brags about destroying entire generations.
Allah will prolong the lives of non-believers so they can see their punishment.
Allah will record what disbelievers say and then prolong their torment.
Allah has sent the devils on the disbelievers to confuse them.
Allah will drive the guilty unto hell a weary herd.
Allah has destroyed many generations.
Allah destroyed entire towns yet the people still disbelieved.
The people cried out for mercy but Allah killed them anyway.
Lo! it hath been revealed unto us that the doom will be for him who denies and turnes away.
In hell he will neither die nor live.
Those who do not believe Allah's revelations will face doom in the Hereafter.
Allah has destroyed many generations.
Disbelievers will not be able to put out the fire on their faces and backs. They will be stupefied and no one will help them.
Fear the Lord and dread the Hour of doom.
Every person alive at the time of the flood was evil. So Allah drowned them all.
The disbelievers will stare in terror at what Allah has in store for them.
When the doom of Allah comes pregnant women will suffer miscarriages and men will act like they are drunk.
Those who turn from the way of Allah will face shame in this world and the doom of burning in the next.
Earthquakes are sent by Allah to terrorize and kill people.
The devil will guide some to the punishment of the Flame.
Whoever thinks that Allah will not give Muhammad victory should go hang himself.
There are many unto whom the doom is justly due. Allah does what he will.

Disbelievers will wear garments of fire and boiling fluid will be poured on their heads their bellies and skin will be melted they will be tormented with iron hooks and when they try to escape they will be driven back with the taunt: Taste the doom of burning.
Allah will provide the disbelievers with a painful doom.
How many towns Allah has destroyed!
They will bid thee hasten on the Doom.
Those who disregard Allah's revelations are the owners of the Fire.
Those who disbelieve will not cease to be in doubt thereof until the Hour come upon them unawares
Those who disbelieve Allah's revelations will have a shameful doom.
Those who disbelieve Allah's revelations will burn in the Fire.
Allah told Noah not to bother pleading for the people he was about to drown.
Those who don't believe in the Hereafter will receive extreme punishment from Allah.
When fire burns their faces they will be glum.
Scourge adulterers and adulteresses with 100 stripes. Do not show them any pity. Have a party of believers watch the punishment.
Those who spread slander will face an awful doom.
Those who murmur will face an awful doom.
Disbelievers will never escape the Fire that will be their home.
Those who deny the coming of the Hour will be chained together and burned with fire. They will pray for their own destruction.
Allah will force the evil-doers to taste great torment.
It will be a hard day for disbelievers and wrong-doers. They will gnaw on their hands and wish they had chosen Islam.
Those who will be gathered on their faces unto hell
Those who deny Muhammad's revelations will be destroyed.
Allah drowned everyone in the flood of Noah and has prepared a painful doom for evil-doers.
The non-muslims will know when they behold the doom who is more astray as to the road.
The doom of hell; lo! the doom thereof is anguish.
Those who cry out to another god with Allah will be tormented doubly in hell.
Hell will appear plainly to the erring.
Allah killed those that ignored Hud's warnings.
Allah destroyed the people in Lot's town with a dreadful rain.
Many will not believe until they see the painful doom.
Those who believe in another god are doomed.
Allah leads those who do not believe in the Hereafter astray by making things work out OK in this life so that he can torment them forever in the next.
Allah destroyed them and their people every one.
Allah sent a dreadful rain on those who stayed behind.
Whoever does something wrong will be thrown into the Fire.
We made them (evil-doers) patterns that invite unto the Fire and on the Day of Resurrection they will not be helped.
Allah has completely destroyed many communities.
Allah will taunt Christians on the day of their doom - saying: Where are My partners whom ye imagined?
Allah caused the earth to swallow Korah.
Those who disbelieve in the revelations of Allah have no hope of mercy. For such there is a painful doom.
You have chosen only idols instead of Allah on the Day of Resurrection ye will deny each other and curse each other and your abode will be the Fire and you will have no helpers.
Bring Allah's doom upon us.
The doom of hell will come upon disbelievers suddenly when they least expect it.
The worst thing you can do is tell a lie about Allah. Hell is the home of disbelievers.
Allah seals the heart of disbelievers. And then he burns them in the Fire.
Those who make the Quran the butt of mockery will have a shameful doom.
Allah will give disbelievers a little comfort for a little while and then he'll torment them forever with a heavy doom.
Allah will fill hell with the jinn and mankind together.
Allah: Taste the doom of immortality.
Those who used to deny the Fire will be tormented in it forever.
The worst thing you can do is to deny the revelations of Allah.
How many generations We destroyed!
Allah has prepared a painful doom for the unfaithful.
Allah cast panic into the hearts of the disbelievers. He killed some and enslaved others.
Those who oppose Islam will be slain with a fierce slaughter.
Allah has cursed the disbelievers and has prepared for them a flaming fire wherein they will abide forever.
When Allah burns the faces of disbelievers in the Fire they'll wish they had obeyed Muhammad and Allah.
Those who disbelieve in the Hereafter will be tormented.
Those who challenge the revelations of Muhammad will have a painful doom.
But some of the jinn Allah burned with flaming Fire.
Those who strive against Allah's revelations will be brought to the doom.
Those who worshipped the jinn will taste the doom of the Fire.
Those who ignore Muhammed will face a terrific doom.
Those who are cast into hell be terrified when they see that they have no escape. Then they will believe. But it will be too late.
The devil is real. He and his followers will burn forever in the Fire.
Those who disbelieve will have an awful doom.
Those who plot iniquities will have an awful doom.
Disbelievers will burn forever in the fire of hell. Allah will keep them alive so that he can torture them forever. When they repent and ask for mercy he will ignore them.
Allah has blinded the disbelievers so that they cannot see the truth. So it don't bother warning them. They will go to hell anyway.
Allah has destroyed many entire generations.
If Allah feels like it he will drown everyone.
Allah will burn the disbelievers in hell.
Those who refuse to believe in Muhammad's revelations will face a painful doom.
If you're not favored by Allah you're doomed.
Those in hell must eat from a tree with the heads of devils and then drink boiling water. After that they return to hell.
Only the single-minded slaves of Allah will be saved from the doom.
Allah killed everyone in Sodom except for Lot and his family.
No one is against Allah except those who burn in hell.
Just wait a while and watch. The unbelievers will soon be destroyed in the doom.
Allah has destroyed many generations.
Those who doubt will soon taste Allah's doom.
Those who deny the messengers deserve doom.
Those who wander from the way of Allah will have an awful doom.
Those who disbelieve will burn in the Fire.
David slashed their legs and necks with Allah's approval.
The transgressors will roast in the Fire and be forced to drink boiling liquids followed by ice cold drinks.
Iblis asks Allah to let him hang around and mislead humans and Iblis leads all humans to hell except for the single-minded slaves. Allah agrees and plans to fill hell with Iblis and his followers.
Tell the disbelievers to enjoy themselves now because later they will be owners of the Fire.
Those who disobey Allah should fear his doom.
The losers will be those who lose themselves and their families on the Day of Resurrection. They will be surrounded by fire.
No one will be able to help those that Allah torments in the Fire.
Wrong-doers will be taunted while suffering in an awful doom.
The doom will come upon those who deny what Allah has revealed.
Allah will make non-believers taste humiliation in the life of the world and the doom of the Hereafter which will be even worse.
The worst thing you can do is tell a lie against Allah. The home of disbelievers is hell.
Surrender to Allah before he sends the doom upon you suddenly.
Disbelievers had their chance to believe. They will all suffer in an endless doom.
Those who lie about Allah will be sent to hell and will have their faces blackened.
Those who disbelieve will be driven into hell.
Allah sent an awful punishment at the time of Noah.
Those who disbelieve are the owners of the Fire.
When the doom comes the hearts of the doomed will choke in their throats and no one will help them.
Those who ignore Allah's "clear proofs" will be seized and punished severely.
Disbelievers will burn forever in the Fire.
The prodigals will be owners of the Fire.
A dreadful doom encompassed Pharaoh's folk.
The doomed will be exposed to the Fire morning and evening.
While burning in the Fire they argue about who is to blame.
Those in hell will beg to be relieved from the Fire's torment for just a day. But the prayer of a disbeliever is in vain.
Those who bicker about Allah's revelations are filled with pride.
Those who scorn Allah will go to hell.
Those who deny the revelations of Allah are perverted.
Those who deny the Scripture and Allah's messengers will be dragged through boiling water and thrust into the Fire.
Allah will taunt the Christians in hell saying: Where are all my partners that you used to believe in?
Those who scorn will go to hell.
When they see Allah's doom they will believe in Allah. But their faith will not save them. The disbelievers will be ruined.
Allah will make life miserable for those who deny his revelations and then he will torment them forever in the Hereafter. And they will not be helped.
The doom of humiliation overtook them because of what they used to earn.
The enemies of Allah will be gathered into the Fire where their skin ears and eyes will testify against them.
Non-muslims will be tormented forever in the Fire. Allah will not have any mercy on them.
Allah will make those who disbelieve taste an awful doom. Their immortal home will be the Fire since they denied Allah's revelations.
Those who disbelieve will taste hard punishment.
While some lounge in the Garden others will roast in the Flame.
Those who argue about Allah will have his wrath upon them. Theirs will be an awful doom.
For wrong-doers there is a painful doom.
And as for disbelievers theirs will be an awful doom.
Allah sometimes kills people for misbehaving.
For such there is a painful doom.
Allah sends some people astray and then punishes them for it by burning them in the Fire.
And you guys will see them exposed to the Fire made humble by disgrace.
Those who turn people away from Islam will be sharers in the doom.
Those who argue and do wrong will have a painful doom that will come upon them suddenly.
The guilty are tormented forever in hell. Allah will not relax their punishment.
Allah will torment disbelievers forever in hell.
Those in torment will claim to believe and ask Allah for relief. But he will refuse since they will return to their disbelief.
Those in hell must eat from a tree like molten brass that burns their bellies. Then boiling water will be poured on their heads.
He hath saved the Muslims from the doom of hell. Everyone else is going to hell.
Those who hear and reject Allah's revelations are sinful liars. Give them tidings of a painful doom.
Those who joke about Allah's revelations will go to hell. Theirs will be a shameful doom.
Those who disbelieve in Allah's revelations will have an awful doom of wrath.
Your habitation is the Fire and there is no one to help you.
Disbelievers will be rewarded with the ignominious doom of the Fire.
Serve only Allah or face the doom of a tremendous day.
The guilty will face a wind with a painful torment.
Allah has destroyed entire towns.
If you believe Muhammad then Allah will forgive some of your sins and protect you from the painful doom (that he plans to torture everyone else with).
Allah will taunt the disbelievers that he torments in the fire saying: Taste the doom!.
Smite the necks of the disbelievers whenever you fight against them. Those who die fighting for Allah will be rewarded.
Allah will damn the disbelievers and make all their actions fruitless.
Disbelievers may eat and be happy now but the Fire will be their final home.
Those in the Garden will drink delicious wine while those in the Fire will drink boiling water that will tear apart their intestines.
Allah curses people by making them deaf and blind.
Angels will gather them together and smite their faces and backs.
Those who think an evil thought concerning Allah will be cursed and sent to hell.
Allah has prepared a flame for the disbelievers.
If you refuse to fight for Allah he will punish you with a painful doom.
Don't turn your back on Allah or He He punish with you a painful doom.
If you're willing to fight for Allah he will provide you with lots of booty.
Allah punished those who disbelieved with a painful punishment.
Those with Muhammad are ruthless toward disbelievers and merciful toward themselves.
Allah will hurl those who believe in another god into a dreadful doom.
We ask Hell: Are you full? and it says back: Are more coming? - Allah talks to hell about it's occupancy level.
Curses on the people who ask: When is the Day of Judgment? It is the day they will be tormented by the Fire.
Lo! the doom of thy Lord will surely come to pass.
Those who deny the existence of hell will be thrust into its Fire.
Their Lord has warded off from them the torment of hell-fire. Everyone else is going to hell -- and the believers are all okay with that.
Allah has been gracious unto us and has preserved us from the torment of the breath of Fire.
Allah destroyed the tribes of A'ad and Thamud. And Noah's folk.
The threatened Hour is nigh.
The tribe of A'ad rejected Allah's warnings. So he blew them all away like they were uprooted palm tree trunks.
Allah destroyed your friends but does anyone remember?
See how dreadful was my punishment!
See how dreadful was my punishment!
See how dreadful was my punishment after my warnings!
The suffering in hell will be more wretched and bitter than anything experienced on earth.
The guilty are in error and madness. On the day they are dragged into the fire on their faces someone will say to them :Feel the touch of hell.
The guilty deny hell. But after they die they go circling between it and fierce boiling water.
But those on his left hand will face scorching wind scalding water and black smoke.
Those who deny Allah and the Hereafter will eat from the Zaqqum tree and drink boiling water.
Allah will welcome the rejecters and erring with boiling water and a roasting in the hell fire.
Those who disbelieve or doubt the revelations of Allah will be face the doom.
The home of disbelievers is the Fire a hapless journey's end.
Those who disbelieve and deny Allah's revelations are the owners of the fire.
All natural disasters are planned by Allah to cause human suffering. He does it by the Book. It's easy for Allah!
For disbelievers is a painful doom.
For disbelievers is a shameful doom.
Those who disobey Muhammad will go to hell.
Don't make friends with Allah's enemies. For those who do  Allah has prepared a dreadful doom.
Those who turn others away from the way of Allah will have a shameful doom. They are rightful owners of the Fire.
The disbelievers fear the believers more than Allah.
The devil and disbelievers will be in the Fire.
Allah loves those who fight for him.
Did you hear the story about the disbelievers that tasted the ill-effects of their conduct? Theirs will be a painful doom.
Nothing bad happens unless Allah wants it to happen.
The fuel of the Fire is men and stones.
Be stern with disbelievers. They are going to Hell anyway.
Allah has prepared for the devils a doom of flame.
Disbelievers will go to hell where they will hear its roaring and boiling.
Who will protect the disbelievers from a painful doom? (Nobody)
Those who consider the Quran to be mere fables will be branded on the nose.
Those who do not believe in Allah will be chained up and cast into hell-fire where they will eat filth.
Allah will sever the life artery of those who invent false sayings about him.

Doom is about to fall on all disbelievers. Only worshippers (Muslims) and those who preserve their chastity (except with their wives and slave girls) will be spared from the fires of hell that are eager to roast.
Disbelievers will enter hell with frantic with fear knowing they will be tortured forever by Allah.(Not by Satan?)
Allah sent Noah to warn people about the painful doom he was planning to send.
Those that Allah drowned in Noah's flood were then tortured forever in the Fire.
Noah asked Allah to drown all the disbelievers.
The fires of hell will be fueled with the bodies of idolators and unbelievers. They will experience an ever-greater torment.
Those who disobey Allah and his messenger will dwell forever in the fire of hell.
Allah will take care of the deniers. He will tie them up and burn them in a raging fire and feed them food that chokes them.
The last day will be a day of anguish for disbelievers.
Those who are stubborn to Allah's revelations will face a fearful doom.
The fire of hell shrivels humans and spares nothing.
Allah has appointed angels to tend the Fire and has prepared stumbling blocks for those who disbelieve. He sends some people (whoever he wants astray.
On that day agony will be heaped on agony.
Nearer and nearer to them is the doom.
Allah has prepared chains and manacles and and a raging fire for the disbelievers.
